response.original_title: The Wayne Shorter Quartet - Live in Paris
response.overview: Renowned American jazz saxophonist Wayne Shorter performs at Paris’ Salle Pleyel theater. 12-time Grammy-Winner Wayne Shorter is renowned for his legendary work with groups with the Art Blakey’s Jazz Messengers and the Second Miles Davis Quintet. In this spectacular 2012 concert, Shorter performs with his famed Wayne Shorter Quartet with bassist John Patitucci, pianist Danilo Perez, and drummer Brian Blade.
response.tagline: Concert recorded on 2012 November 3rd at La Salle Pleyel, Paris.
response.title: The Wayne Shorter Quartet - Live in Paris
